SELECT EMPLYR_ID, USER_NM EMPLYR_NM, ESNTL_ID UNIQ_ID, SEXDSTN_CODE, BRTHDY, HOUSE_ADRES HOME_ADRES, DETAIL_ADRES, EMAIL_ADRES, OFFM_TELNO FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE 1=1

ORDER BY USER_NM DESC
